39 00000


2)

2a. 1110110001000000
2b. 0000001011000100
2c. 1100010010110110
2d. 1101100010000000
2e. 1000000101101101

3)

3a. 20
sign-magnitude:
00010100 (20)
10010100 (-20)
twos-complement:
00010100 (20)
11101100 (-20)

3b. -71
sign-magnitude:
01000111 (71)
11000111 (-71)
twos-complement:
01000111 (71)
10111001 (-71)

3c. -68
sign-magnitude:
01000100 (68)
11000100 (-68)
twos-complement:
01000100 (68)
10111100 (-68)

3d. 91
sign-magnitude:
01011011 (91)
11011011 (-91)
twos-complement:
01011011 (91)
10100101 (-91)

3e. 114
sign-magnitude:
01110010 (114)
11110010 (-114)
twos-complement:
01110010 (114)
10001110 (-114)

4)
4a. 0111010101000100
   +        00100000
   _________________
    0111010101100100 = no overflow

    0111010101000100 (r1)
    ----------------
    1000101010111100 (r1 2s complement)
   -        00100000
   _________________
    0000000000000000 = overflow

4b. 1111010110010000
   +    001011100100
   _________________
    1111011001110100 = no overflow

    1111010110010000 (r1)
    ----------------
    0000101001110000 (r1 2s complement)
   -    001011100100
   _________________
    0000000000000000 = overflow
